title: NodeList
description: The `NodeList` JS browser API object represents a collection of nodes, such as those returned by methods like `.querySelectorAll()`, which can be either live or static, allowing iteration over the nodes.
content: The browser API object that represents a collection of DOM nodes returned by methods like `.querySelectorAll()`. Unlike arrays, NodeLists are array-like objects, meaning they can be accessed by index but may not have all array methods.
